attributes.action: save prescot drive from possible closure
attributes.additional_details: It has been proposed by liverpool council to make cuts to services, prescot drive being one of them. As families who use this service we need to let the people inolved in making these decisions know that we  strongly object to this proposal, we need this service, our children deserve this service , it is a lifeline to families that should not be broken. Please sign to show your support.
